#labels Featured
= Release Notes =

== r50 ==

  * It checks for newer version and shows alert if there is one.

== r42 ==

  * You can search with excluding some keywords. Prefix - to excludes that word from the search results.
    * Example
      test.avi -zip      (search for test.avi excluding results having zip in name)
 
== r33 ==

  * For first time users, it sets ~/Downloads as incoming files and directories folder.
  * Set as Incoming Files & Set as Incoming Directories menu works now.
  * All Files smart folder works now.
